      • create

        public int create(java.util.List<java.lang.String> mcqInfo)
        This method will perform 'insert' command by using parameters for MCQQuestion table. First, it will insert a row and then find them again to know the MCQid. It will make log "insert success" and "done getting MCQId : " + mcqId.
        Parameters:
        mcqInfo - - List of String : choice1~4, answer
        Returns:
        int - 0: error / other number : the MCQid of created MCQ information

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        This method will perform 'update' command by using parameters for MCQQuestion table. It will make log "A MCQquestion is updated."
        Parameters:
        list - - ArrayList of String : choice1~4, answer, mcqid

      • delete

        public void delete(int mcqid)
        This method will perform 'delete' command by using mcqid for MCQQuestion table. It will make log "A MCQquestion is deleted."
        Parameters:
        mcqid - - int

      • correctAnswer

        public boolean correctAnswer(int mcqid,
                             java.lang.String answer)
        Deprecated. 
        This method return if answer is correct answer or not.
        Parameters:
        mcqid - - int
        answer - - String
        Returns:
        boolean : 1 : correct / 0 : incorrect

      • showWhereMcqid

        public MCQQuestion showWhereMcqid(int mcqid)
        This method will be called with mcqid. It will find information by mcqid and send a MCQQuestion with MCQId, choice1~4, and answer.
        Parameters:
        mcqid - - int
        Returns:
        MCQQuestion

      • print

        public void print(int mcqid)
        This method will print choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, and answer by mcqid.
        Parameters:
        mcqid - - int
